title: Water temperature data from the Little Bear River, UT
abstract: This dataset contains time series of observations of water temperature in the Little Bear River, UT. Data were recorded every 30 minutes. The values were recorded using a HydroLab MS5 multi-parameter water quality sonde connected to a Campbell Scientific datalogger.

contributors.name: Jeff Horsburgh
contributors.organization: Utah State University Utah Water Research Laboratory

processing_level.explanation: Quality controlled data that have passed quality assurance procedures such as routine estimation of timing and sensor calibration or visual inspection and removal of obvious errors. An example is USGS published streamflow records following parsing through USGS quality control procedures.
